title: [GAMEPLAY] battle angel kai'sa audio
body: I have all sounds besides pings muted, however when a battle angel kai'sa is in the game, sound effects start playing that don't even line up with her visuals while shes on screen

replies.body:
Hey D4RKN355 R3V3N63,

Thanks for the report! We've got a ticket logged for the issue and have someone investigating. :)
